text.p: Click on a column header to sort the table.

ROW.title: Panorama Input Files
ROW.tagdesc: The list of files processed with Hugin program through Panorama tool.

ROW.title: Enfuse Input Files
ROW.tagdesc: The list of files processed with Enfuse program through ExpoBlending tool.

ROW.title: Enfuse Settings
ROW.tagdesc: The list of Enfuse settings used to blend image stack with ExpoBlending tool.

ROW.title: PicasaWeb Item ID
ROW.tagdesc: Item ID from PicasaWeb web service.

ROW.title: Yandex Fotki Item ID
ROW.tagdesc: Item ID from Yandex Fotki web service.
